name: The Void Above Us
description:
Take control of humanity's last hope for survival - a spaceship headed for Alpha Centauri. In your path is a perilous asteroid belt that's sure to destroy your ship. Will you make out it alive?

The Void Above Us was developed by a team of 4 during Vancouver Film School's May 2020 Game Jam. We had a 2-Days 50-hour time limit and our theme was "Contain".

  • Divyesh Panchal
    • 3D Artist
  • Eduardo Berron
    • UI and 2D Artist
  • Guillermo Garduño
    • Gameplay Programmer & VFX
  • Sabastian Peters
    • UI Programmer & Audio

All scripts, audio and visuals were created in the 50 hour time limit except for the textures, which were retrieved from a variety of royalty-free sources. 

Made in Unity3D using Maya, Illustrator,  Ableton and BFXR.
